price: ከሴቶችም አባቶቻችሁ ያገቡዋቸውን አታግቡ፡፡ (ትቀጡበታላችሁ)፡፡ ያለፈው ሲቀር፡፡ እርሱ መጥፎና የተጠላ ሥራ ነውና፡፡ መንገድነቱም ከፋ!
arabic: وَلَا تَنكِحُواْ مَا نَكَحَ ءَابَآؤُكُم مِّنَ ٱلنِّسَآءِ إِلَّا مَا قَدۡ سَلَفَۚ إِنَّهُۥ كَانَ فَٰحِشَةٗ وَمَقۡتٗا وَسَآءَ سَبِيلًا

version.title: Amharic translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Amharic by Muhammad Sadeq and Muhammad Ath-Thany Habib. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: walā tankiḥū mā nakaḥa ābāukum mina al-nisāi illā mā qad salafa innahu kāna fāḥishatan wamaqtan wasāa sabīlan
